entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
